lang_package.07:
Welcome to the clickMouse installer!

This program will guide you through the installation process in a few minutes.
Click Next to start the installation assistant.
lang_package.08: I have read and agree to the license agreement
lang_package.09: Please read the license agreement below and click Next to continue.

lang_package.0d: Please select the shortcut you want to create:

lang_package.07:
欢迎使用 clickMouse 安装向导!

这个程序将简单的使用几分钟时间，帮助你完成安装。
点击下一步开启安装助手。
